item.title: Containers: Just Because Everyone Else is Doing Them Wrong, Doesn't Mean You Have To
item.description: The recent CVE-2015-7547 vulnerability in glibc exposed a common antipattern in container management. Here's what you can do to avoid it, and instead adopt a container management pattern that will preserve your sanity and enable you to react to critical issues in minutes.
